text.desc: It is one of the most famous dinosaurs in the world and is one of the world's largest carnivorous dinosaurs.
It is a huge herbivorous dinosaur with a huge row of bone plates on its back and four spikes on the dangerous tail.
The most notable features of herbivorous dinosaurs are their three horns and very large head shields.
Carnivorous dinosaurs are famous for their unique sails and huge body shape.
It is a kind of dinosaur that feeds on plants and is covered with "armor".
It is a medium-sized herbivorous dinosaur with a strange two-legged walking. The claws are huge and chilling.
It is a small herbivorous dinosaur with a head like a bird, claws and wings that can fly slightly.
It is the herbivorous dinosaur with the longest neck and tail among the dinosaurs discovered so far.
Omnivorous dinosaurs are extremely good at running. They look very similar to ostriches without feathers. When they see the enemy, they will run hard.
Carnivorous dinosaurs, with two large bone crowns on the top of the head, hence the name Double Ridge Dragon, also known as the Double Crown Dragon, with short forelimbs and good at running.
The herbivorous dinosaur is very docile. He walks on four legs and occasionally lifts his forefoot and stands on his hind legs.
Agile and fast carnivorous dinosaur with feathers on the forearms but not flying, three large, sharp fingers and flexible wrists.
